short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to show web performance with budget capability (Speed index, DOMContentLoaded, Time to first byte)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Layar Performence budget is showing your website performance ( RUM Speed Index, DOMContentLoaded and TTFB) with budget capability. This extension will help you when develop website so you can improve your web speed. Happy tweaking!
